verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, there was <S%G1096><s%> silence <S%G4602><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the space of half an hour <S%G2256><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> were given <S%G1325><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> trumpets <S%G4536><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> censer <S%G3031><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> incense <S%G2368><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should offer <S%G1325><s%> it with the prayers <S%G4335><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the golden <S%G5552><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> which was <S%G3588><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of the incense <S%G2368><s%>, which came with the prayers <S%G4335><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%>, ascended up <S%G305><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%>'s hand <S%G5495><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the censer <S%G3031><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> filled <S%G1072><s%> it <S%G846><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there were <S%G1096><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thunderings <S%G1027><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lightnings <S%G796><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> an earthquake <S%G4578><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> trumpets <S%G4536><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> sound <S%G4537><s%>.

The <S%G2532><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded <S%G4537><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> there followed <S%G1096><s%> hail <S%G5464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> mingled <S%G3396><s%> with blood <S%G129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they were cast <S%G906><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of trees <S%G1186><s%> was burnt up <S%G2618><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> green <S%G5515><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%> was burnt up <S%G2618><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded <S%G4537><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%> was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the creatures <S%G2938><s%> which were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and had <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G5590><s%>, died <S%G599><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the ships <S%G4143><s%> were destroyed <S%G1311><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded <S%G4537><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> there fell <S%G4098><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> star <S%G792><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, burning <S%G2545><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> a lamp <S%G2985><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the rivers <S%G4215><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the fountains <S%G4077><s%> of waters <S%G5204><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the star <S%G792><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Wormwood <S%G894><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the waters <S%G5204><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G99999><s%> wormwood <S%G894><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> men <S%G444><s%> died <S%G599><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the waters <S%G5204><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they were made bitter <S%G4087><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded <S%G4537><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the sun <S%G2246><s%> was struck <S%G4141><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the moon <S%G4582><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the stars <S%G792><s%>; so as <S%G2443><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> was darkened <S%G4654><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> shone <S%G5316><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> for a third part <S%G5154><s%> of it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the night <S%G3571><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I looked <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> an <S%G1520><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> flying <S%G4072><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the midst of heaven <S%G3321><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, Woe <S%G3759><s%>, woe <S%G3759><s%>, woe <S%G3759><s%>, to the inhabiters <S%G2730><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> by reason <S%G1537><s%> of the other <S%G3062><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> of the trumpet <S%G4536><s%> of the three <S%G5140><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> are yet <S%G3195><s%> to sound <S%G4537><s%>!
